iceberg Documentation

Welcome to the documentation page for the development of an iceberg model for MITgcm. This documentation reflects the MITgcm package, example configurations, and associated tools provided on the iceberg Github repository.

Motivation

Icebergs represent an import forcing on ocean properties around ice sheets. However, they are not currently built into MITgcm in package wide range of applications that can be used across scales from fjord-scale models to global circulation models. In this project, our goal is to create a general iceberg package that fit this need.

Existing iceberg Packages

Currently, there are two iceberg packages that have been developed and used in MITgcm.
